means: <希神>赫斯提（女灶神，罗马神话中称为Vesta）

sentence.Network_en: Hestia is the sister to Zeus, Poseidon, and Hades.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫斯提亚是宙斯 、 波塞冬和哈迪斯的姐姐.

sentence.Network_en: Hestia, the goddess of the hearth, represented home life and family happiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有灶神赫斯提亚, 代表居家生活和家庭幸福.

sentence.Network_en: They were his daughters Hestia, Demeter and Hera, and sons Pluto and Poseidon.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们是克罗诺斯的女儿赫提斯,得墨忒耳,赫拉以及儿子普路托和波塞冬.

means.word_mean: 1. (Greek mythology) the goddess of the hearth and its fire in ancient mythology; identified with Roman Vesta

auth_sentence.content: Here, even travelers from far off lands feel the warm breath of Hestia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here, even travelers from far off lands feel the warm breath of Hestia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here, even travelers from far off lands feel the warm breath of Hestia.
